p:
Due to the limitations of pig genome annotation, this study included background human orthologous genes
61 . After transforming the pig gene into a human gene in the Ensembl website, gene ontology (GO) and the Kyoto Gene and Genomic Encyclopedia (KEGG)
18â€“ 20 pathway enrichment analysis were performed in Metascape
21 . Subsequent selection of p value less than 0.05 is a valid result.
